TopicTitle: weird random crash with no warning

Articles.Content:
I've been having CTDs but always with an error message from ksp.exe.

This time the game just crash in a split second with no warning (lag or any kind of bug ingame) and no error message back in windows.

Maybe you guys can tell me if my RAM is failing me or if its a nasty mod causing trouble.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/k6l2ih5dtbc39de/output_log.txt?dl=0
